EmailTemplate.name: Partial Removal template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Removal__c} Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Removal__c} partial removal of Freestyle dispenser(s) has been completed. Please take appropriate action to ensure product, linkage, indicator setup, removal execution and assess management procedures are adhered to.
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
